name: Movement
//: Wheels, rotors, engines, motors, controls, alternators, fuel tanks, batteries and seats.

name: Power Generation
//: Reactors, engines, alternators, fuel tanks, batteries, solar panels and controls. Anything that makes the vehicle produce and store power.

name: Hull
//: Frames, armor, rams, doors, roofs, hulls and structural bits of all kinds.

name: Weapons
//: Turret mounts, mounted weapons and rams.

name: Passengers
//: Aisles, seats, beds, and possibly animal carriers and livestock stalls.

name: Cargo
//: Anything that holds cargo, such as seats, cargo racks, trunks, etc.

name: Utility
//: Crafting stations, water purifiers, and pseudo-crafting stations like the dishwasher.
